link_desc:
- low-level discovery of all configured NTP peers (key "ntp.peers")

- item prototype for local offset against a given peer (key "ntp.peeroffset[*]")

- trigger prototypes for two thresholds of high offset

- two template macros to configure these thresholds

UserParameters needed in agent configuration:

UserParameter=ntp.peers,/path/to/your/d_ntppeers.sh
UserParameter=ntp.peeroffset[*],/path/to/your/d_peeroffset.sh $1

Scripts included:

d_ntppeers.sh - used for peer discovery

d_peeroffset.sh - used to query offset of a given peer
author: Andrej Kacian
